text: hi there I'm Sarah and I'm going to show
you two questions that will help you
while you're shopping in North America
for clothing that will help you when
you're looking for size and for color so
let's get started
pretend that you're shopping you find a
shirt that you really like but they
don't have the size that you want so you
ask the salesperson excuse me do you
have this in small do you have this in
medium do you have this enlarged or if
you know the number of the size that
you're looking for do you have this in
size 4 do you have this in size 5 and so
on second way of asking does this come
in small does this come in medium does
this come in large or same if you know
the number does this come in size 5 and
moving on and now we're going to talk
about the same question but about color
instead of size so your shopping you
have that same shirt that you like but
you want it in a different color so you
ask the salesperson do you have this in
hot pink I love hot pink but maybe you
want it in black do you have this in
black do you have this in white do you
have this in green and the next one does
this come in hot pink does this come in
black does this come in green they mean
the same thing let's move on so we've
just learned the two different questions
that will help you when you're shopping
for a different size or a different
color when buying clothing in North
America the first one was do you have
this in size 4 do you have this in size
8 do you have this in medium or four
color do you have this in hot pink do
you have this in green and the second
way of asking was does this come in size
8 does this come in small does this come
in medium or four color does this come
in hot pink does this come in yellow I
have a really hard time by
clothes in South Korea sometimes I can't
ask for a different color or a different
size because I get confused but I know
that these two questions will help you
when buying clothes in North America and
see you next time
